dan ohu engalanthaye aacharya upadhiya laba injineruwarayeku lesa sewaya karanawa. 1955 di upan shri haran putha dan skotlanthaye stath ayi wishwa widyalaye litho mudrana shilpa anshaye adhipathiwaraya lesa katayuthu karanawa. 1960 di upan miyurunisa piyasundari diyaniya ilektonika injineruwariyak.daru thidenama wiwaha wela.

:: hela yugaya :: wirawana raja(wirakocha) - pathalaya | hela yugaya wirawana raja(wirakocha) - pathalaya hela shishtacharaye thawath wadagath rajek.ohuge bisawa sulochana wiya.wirawana raja wisin aluthin shishtachara athi wu than sandaha parani gamsabha kramaya genayana ladi.dakunu ha uthuru amarikawa mema shishtachara athi wu warthamana sthanayi.
